00019 #ifndef _TLM_INITIATOR_PORT_BASE_H_

00024  * Includes

00026 #include <vector>
00027 
00028 //#include "systemc.h"
00029 
00030 #include "tlm_target_port_base.h"
00031 
00032 
00033   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 
00046   //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047   class tlm_initiator_port_base {
00048 
00049     typedef tlm_initiator_port_base this_type;
00050     typedef tlm_target_port_base target_port_type;
00051     
00052   public:
00053     
00054     //--------------
00055     // Constructor
00056     //--------------
00057     tlm_initiator_port_base() {
00058       // Adds the port itself to the reversed initiator port list
00059       m_reversed_initiator_port_list.push_back(this);
00060     }
00061 
00062 
00063     //------------------------------------------
00065     //------------------------------------------
00067     
00069     inline void register_target_port(target_port_type * target_port) {
00070       m_target_port_list.push_back(target_port);
00071     }
00072 
00074     inline std::vector<target_port_type *>& get_target_port_list() {
00075       return(m_target_port_list);
00076     }
00077     
00079     inline void set_target_port_list(std::vector<target_port_type *>& target_port_list) {
00080       m_target_port_list = target_port_list;
00081     }
00082 
00083     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 
00086     inline void register_initiator_port(this_type * initiator_port) {
00087       m_initiator_port_list.push_back(initiator_port);
00088     }
00089 
00091     inline std::vector<this_type *>& get_initiator_port_list() {
00092       return(m_initiator_port_list);
00093     }
00094 
00096     inline void set_initiator_port_list(std::vector<this_type *>& initiator_port_list) {
00097       m_initiator_port_list = initiator_port_list;
00098     }
00099 
00100     //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 
00103     inline void reversed_register_initiator_port(this_type * initiator_port) {
00104       m_reversed_initiator_port_list.push_back(initiator_port);
00105     }
00106 
00108     inline std::vector<this_type *>& get_reversed_initiator_port_list() {
00109       return(m_reversed_initiator_port_list);
00110     }
00111 
00113     inline void set_reversed_initiator_port_list(std::vector<this_type *>& initiator_port_list) {
00114       m_reversed_initiator_port_list = initiator_port_list;
00115     }
00116 
00118 
00119 
00120   protected:
00121 
00123 
00126     std::vector<target_port_type *> m_target_port_list;
00127     
00128     
00130 
00133     std::vector<this_type *> m_initiator_port_list;
00134 
00136 
00140     std::vector<this_type *> m_reversed_initiator_port_list;
00141 
00143 
00145     void create_port_list(std::vector<this_type *>& port_list) {
00146       assert(port_list.size() > 0);      
00147       this_type& current_port = *port_list[(port_list.size()-1)];    
00148       // For all the registed initiator port of the port
00149       for (int i=0;i<(int)current_port.get_initiator_port_list().size();i++) {
00150         // register only other ports (the list contains the port itself)
00151         if (static_cast<this_type *>(&current_port) != current_port.get_initiator_port_list()[i]) {
00152           port_list.push_back(current_port.get_initiator_port_list()[i]); // register port
00153           this->create_port_list(port_list); // find again in the updated port list
00154         }
00155       }
00156     }
00157 
00158 
00159   };
